title: Homepage loads with hero and file upload area visible
description: Verify that the homepage loads successfully displaying the hero section and the file upload area.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage URL.
Check that the hero section with product overview text is visible.
Verify the file upload area is displayed with drag-and-drop and click-to-upload options.

title: File upload accepts valid MP3 and WAV files under 10MB
description: Confirm that users can upload MP3 and WAV files under 10MB via drag-and-drop and file selector.

steps.description: On the homepage, drag and drop a valid MP3 file under 10MB into the file upload area.
Check the file preview displays correct file name, size, and duration.
Remove uploaded file and use the click-to-upload selector to pick a valid WAV file under 10MB.
Verify the file preview updates correctly with the new file details.

title: File upload rejects invalid file types
description: Ensure that uploading files other than MP3 or WAV triggers appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Attempt to upload a .txt or .jpg file via drag-and-drop in the file upload area.
Check that an error message displays indicating invalid file type.
Try uploading a file with an unsupported audio codec but valid extension.
Verify that the same or an appropriate error message is shown.

title: File upload rejects files over 10MB
description: Verify that files larger than 10MB cannot be uploaded and an error message is shown.

steps.description: Attempt to upload an MP3 or WAV file larger than 10MB via drag-and-drop.
Confirm that an error message indicates the file size exceeds the 10MB limit.

title: Start processing navigates to Processing Page with progress bar
description: Check that clicking 'Separate Audio' on a valid uploaded file transitions to the Processing Page displaying progress.

steps.description: Upload a valid audio file under the size limit.
Click the 'Separate Audio' button.
Verify navigation to Processing Page.
Check the animated progress bar is visible showing percentage, current stem extraction, and estimated time remaining.

title: Progress bar updates correctly throughout processing
description: Validate the animated progress bar updates percentage and displays the correct current stem during simulated AI processing.

steps.description: Start processing a valid audio file.
Observe progress bar percentage increments smoothly from 0% to 100%.
Verify the displayed current stem extraction messages cycle through vocals, drums, bass, and other.
Check that estimated time remaining updates realistically during processing.

title: Cancel button aborts processing and navigates back to Homepage
description: Verify the cancel functionality on the Processing Page stops the audio separation and returns the user to the Homepage.

steps.description: Begin processing a valid audio file.
Click the 'Cancel' button while processing is ongoing.
Confirm that processing stops immediately.
Verify navigation back to Homepage.

title: Completion of processing redirects to Results Page
description: Check that upon finishing stem separation, the app automatically redirects to the Results Page showing separated stems.

steps.description: Upload and start processing a valid audio file.
Wait for processing to complete (progress bar reaches 100%).
Confirm automatic navigation to Results Page.

title: Results Page displays all four StemPlayers with correct color coding
description: Verify each of the four stems (vocals, drums, bass, other) is represented by a StemPlayer with the correct color and label.

steps.description: Navigate to Results Page after processing completes.
Check that four StemPlayers are visible.
Validate that vocals StemPlayer is sky blue, drums emerald green, bass amber, and other pink.

title: StemPlayers playback controls function correctly
description: Test play/pause, volume control, mute toggle, and seek bar for each StemPlayer operate as expected.

steps.description: On the Results Page, for each StemPlayer, click play button.
Verify stem audio plays.
Use volume slider to adjust volume.
Confirm volume changes accordingly.
Toggle mute on and off.
Check that audio is muted/unmuted as expected.
Use seek bar to jump to a different playback position.
Ensure audio seeks to the selected position.

title: Individual stem download buttons work correctly
description: Check that clicking each StemPlayer's download button triggers download of the respective stem audio file.

steps.description: On the Results Page, click the download button on vocals StemPlayer.
Verify that the vocals stem audio file is downloaded.
Repeat for drums, bass, and other StemPlayers.
Confirm correct stem files are downloaded for each.

title: 'Download All Stems' downloads all stems in batch
description: Validate that clicking the 'Download All Stems' button downloads all four stems simultaneously.

steps.description: On Results Page, click the 'Download All Stems' button.
Check that all four stem files start downloading in batch.

title: 'Process Another File' button resets state and navigates to Homepage
description: Ensure clicking 'Process Another File' clears the current state and returns user to the Homepage for a new upload.

steps.description: On Results Page, click the 'Process Another File' button.
Verify app state is reset (no file preview or loaded stems).
Confirm navigation to Homepage.

title: All audio processing occurs client-side without data leaving browser
description: Confirm that the simulated stem separation and audio processing happen entirely on the client without server interaction.

steps.description: Start processing a valid audio file.
Monitor network requests to ensure no audio data is sent to external servers.
Verify processing completes successfully with no external data transmission.

title: UI responsiveness and accessibility on mobile and desktop
description: Test that the homepage, processing page, and results page render correctly and remain fully functional on various screen sizes and devices.

steps.description: Access the app on desktop browser at various window sizes.
Verify all elements are visible, buttons clickable, and layout adjusts properly.
Access the app on different mobile devices and simulators.
Ensure UI remains usable, responsive, and accessible including header, footer, navigation, file upload, progress bar, and stem players.
